dcterms:creator: Réka Albert
Albert-László Barabási
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset that generates a base graph with the Barabási-Albert model and attaches randomly a house-like, five-node motif. It has four labels corresponding to different parts of the graph.
dcterms:title: BA-shapes

dcterms:creator: Réka Albert
Albert-László Barabási
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset containing two BA-shapes graphs with randomly attached edges. The memberships of the BA-shapes graphs and the structural location determine the labels.
dcterms:title: BA-Community

dcterms:creator: Réka Albert
Albert-László Barabási
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset where the base graph is a balanced tree graph with a depth equal to 8, and the motifs are a six-node cycle. It has two labels: motifs and non-motifs.
dcterms:title: Tree-cycle

dcterms:creator: Réka Albert
Albert-László Barabási
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset that substitutes the previous motif with a grid of nine nodes. It is used for node classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Tree-grids

dcterms:creator: Réka Albert
Albert-László Barabási
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset containing 800 graphs, each with a base component generated with the BA model. The label is determined by the presence of either a cycle or house-like motif.
dcterms:title: BA-2motifs

dcterms:creator: AK Debnath
RL Lopez de Compadre
G Debnath
AJ Shusterman
C Hansch
dcterms:description: A molecular dataset containing several molecules represented as graphs where nodes represent atoms and edges represent chemical bonds. The molecules are labelled based on their mutagenic effect on a specific bacterium.
dcterms:title: MUTAG
